titles.title: A resolution designating June 15, 2015, as "World Elder Abuse Awareness Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
6/15/2015--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates June 15, 2015, as World Elder Abuse Awareness Day.
